summary: This bill, the Kissimmee River Wild and Scenic River Act, aims to amend the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate a segment of the Kissimmee River in Florida as part of the Wild and Scenic Rivers System. The designated segment, the restored portion of the river, will be administered by the Secretary of the Interior as a recreational river. The bill also withdraws federal land within the designated boundaries from various forms of appropriation and disposal.
